result.title: Efficient Data Structure ... 1
result.content:
A data structure is required to maintain a set of n boolean flags, each of which may be true or false. The operations to be performed are: Initialization using constructor can take O(n) time a) set(i) : set the ith flag to true. b) reset(i) : set the ith flag to false. c) test(i) : return the value of the ith flag. d) setAll() : set all flags to true.
e) resetAll() : set all flags to false.

Describe a data structure that implements all these operations in O(1) time.
